branchCategory.name: M(D)BW-Z, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Double Rod
branchCategory.description: The MB double rod, double acting, light weight, medium duty tie rod cylinder. Available bore sizes range from 32mm to 125mm. The standard air cushion utilizes a floating cushion seal to eliminate piston rod bouncing.
